description:
Gamma shows overwhelming strength. Even so, Ryohei fights him while healing his wounds at a high rate. Gokudera is tied up with rope strengthened by Ryohei`s Sun flames. He manages to release Uri from his box and orders him to bite through the ropes. But Uri completely ignores him and heads towards Gamma. Ryohei stops Uri, and protects him from Gamma`s attack. But immediately after, he gets hit by one of Gamma`s merciless attacks, and collapses. Gamma tries to deliver his finishing blow to Ryohei, but at that moment, Gokudera activates his Sistema C.A.I.!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le gardien de la tempête se lève
